Transcription of the human <extra_id_0> beta-globin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene cluster depends upon upstream regulatory sequences , which are collectively termed the locus control region .

text: Recent studies have provided new insights into how the individual genes of the cluster are regulated through development .
The crux of transcriptional activation is how the locus control region communicates with the gene-proximal regulatory elements .
